function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"The potential spread of contagious diseases due to multiple data series in multiple regions being observed together","Impact":"Increased risk of cross-contamination and spread of infections across different regions","Mitigation":"Implement stringent data collection and observation protocols to prevent cross-contamination and spread","Technologies":"Advanced data analytics and modeling to identify and isolate potential sources of cross-contamination","People":"Population in the regions being observed, researchers, and data collection personnel","Owner":"Research institutions, health organizations, and government agencies"},{"Description":"Assumption of randomly distributed initial uncertainty variables with unknown covariance","Impact":"Risk of inaccurate estimation and prediction due to uncertain covariance and assumptions","Mitigation":"Conduct sensitivity analyses, validate assumptions, and incorporate known information to reduce uncertainty","Technologies":"Statistical modeling, sensitivity analysis tools, and validation methods","People":"Researchers, statisticians, and data analysts","Owner":"Research institutions and organizations conducting the estimation"},{"Description":"Treating the population intercept as an empirical mean over the population members","Impact":"Potential bias in the filtering process and objective function construction","Mitigation":"Implement rigorous validation and verification processes, and consider alternative approaches for population intercept handling","Technologies":"Validation and verification tools, alternative modeling approaches","People":"Research analysts and model developers","Owner":"Research institutions and organizations conducting the estimation"}]}
